item.title: CVE-2023-5988|2024-08-27T15:04:24.024Z -- uyumsoft%20information%20system%20and%20technologies -- lioxerp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Uyumsoft Information System and Technologies LioXERP allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects LioXERP: before v.146.
